nodes.text: A male Duros thug worked for the Hutt crime boss Jabba Desilijic Tiure around 0 BBY. That year, Jabba ordered his Duros employee to meet the Whiphid bounty hunter D'Wopp on the very day of his wedding with Lady Valarian, the Hutt's greatest rival. The Duros thug's mission was to a offer D'Wopp a bounty he would be eager to accept, in hopes the Whiphid would leave the wedding celebration and ruin it.
